cln_elements.content: Fig. 3 (a) Left-handed helix bridged by IDA2− ligands, running parallel to the a direction with a 21 screw axis (green) passing through. (b) Perspective view of the 3D framework of 4a, showing one-dimensional helices are bridged by the HIDA− ligands to form a 3D framework.
cln_elements.clean_text: Fig. 3  (a) Left-handed helix bridged by IDA2- ligands, running parallel to the a direction with a 21 screw axis (green) passing through. (b) Perspective view of the 3D framework of 4a, showing one-dimensional helices are bridged by the HIDA- ligands to form a 3D framework.

metadata.title: A series of three-dimensional (3D) chiral lanthanide coordination polymers generated by spontaneous resolution
